attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible, glitches, fake news, and so much spam. Don’t get this app, it’s not worth the lost brain cells.
attributes.title: AWFUL APP

attributes.review: I downloaded this app for informational use then it went rogue on me. It know has control over my whole house😱😱😱😱. It made my fridge kill my pet turtle😫😫😫 ( R. I. P. zoomer🙏🏾).

all i wanted to do was support our completely and totally non-racist, non-homophobic, and non-misogynistic cheeto president. the app constantly glitches all the time and i’m always left with a virus!
absolutely terrible! don’t get this app, hell, i don’t even plan on voting for trump anytime soon! 
horrible!
attributes.title: terrible app!!

attributes.review: This app is swarming with child rapists and sex traffickers. The racists pop out here and there and so do the xenophobic sand the homophobic presidents. This app scarred my child and now I have to take him to therapy.

attributes.review: This app is really terrible. It is just so incredibly bad. It lags and and takes up storage space. Like sooo terrible!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
